CreateIAPUserOIDCConfig.document: This example shows you how to create IAP's OIDC configuration.
CreateIAPUserOIDCConfig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: iap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateIAPUserOIDCConfig
<Common request parameters>

{
    "IdentityUrl": "https://accounts.g**gle.com",
    "ClientId": "47***4801-pu***e7tj.apps.g**gleusercontent.com",
    "AuthorizationEndpoint": "https://accounts.g**gle.com/o/oauth2/v2/auth",
    "ResponseType": "id_token",
    "ResponseMode": "form_post",
    "MappingFiled": "email",
    "IdentityKey": "ewogICAgImtleXMiOiBb*******gICBdCn0=",
    "Scope": [
        "openid",
        "email",
        "profile"
    ],
    "Description": "111"
}
CreateIAPUserOIDCConfig.title: Creating IAP's OIDC Configuration
